text: Arra wa, izen ni Isuraeru no shison to yakusoku o musuba re, ware wa kare-ra no naka kara 12-ri no shucho o tateta. Soshite arra wa ose rareta. `Hontoni ware wa anata gata to issho ni iru nodearu. Moshi anata gataga reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o nashi, ware no shito-tachi o shinjite enjo shi, arra ni yoi kashitsuke o surunaraba, ware wa, kanarazu anata gata no subete no zaigo o shometsu shi, kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen ni kitto haira seyou. Kongo anata gata no naka, kore (yakusoku) o shinjinai mono wa, tadashi michi kara mayoi saru
